name: Fred's place full version RELEASED!
description: A parody mod based on any mod of Baldi existing! explore Fred's place as you learn math's, collect agendas, and uhh, dodge Fred I guess? meet friends such as Tollbot, Planky, cop, push rock and the moai! some content within this mod is joke related, so don't take it all seriously. I WORKED MONTHS ON THIS MOD! (also find some secrets along the way!) this is my biggest project so far.
